info.name: Urlaubsverwaltung API
info.description:
This rest API provides the possibility to fetch information about absences, availabilities, persons, public holidays, sicknotes, vacations and many more...

Contact Support:
 Name: Urlaubsverwaltung
 Email: info@urlaubsverwaltung.cloud

item.name: Calculate the work days for a certain period and person

request.description: The calculation depends on the working time of the person.

item.name: Get all sick notes for a certain period and person

request.description: Get all sick notes for a certain period and person. Information only reachable for users with role office and for own sick notes.

item.name: Get all public holidays for a certain period

variable.description: (Required) ID of the person to get the public holidays for.

request.description: Get all public holidays for a certain period. Information only reachable for users with role office and for own public holidays.

variable.description: (Required) ID of the person to get the public holidays for.
(Required) ID of the person to get the public holidays for.
(Required) ID of the person to get the public holidays for.

item.name: Get all availabilities for a certain period and person

query.description: (Required) start of interval to get availabilities from (inclusive)
(Required) end of interval to get availabilities from (inclusive)

request.description: Get all availabilities for a certain period and person. Maximum allowed period per request is one month.

item.name: Get all absences for a certain period and person

query.description: (Required) start of interval to get absences from (inclusive)
(Required) end of interval to get absences from (inclusive)
Type of absences, vacation or sick notes
Whether to include no-workdays or not. Default is 'false' which will ignore no-workdays.

request.description: Get all absences for a certain period and person

item.name: Get one active person by id

request.description: Get one active person by id

item.name: Get all allowed vacations for department members for the given person and the certain period

query.description: (Required) end of interval to get vacations from (inclusive)
(Required) end of interval to get vacations from (inclusive)
If defined returns only the vacations of the department members of the person

request.description: Get all allowed vacations for department members for the given person and the certain period. All the waiting and allowed vacations of the departments the person is assigned to, are fetched. Information only reachable for users with role office and for your own data.

item.name: Get all active persons of the application

request.description: Get all active persons of the application
Get Vacation-Overview metadata for all members of a department

item.name: Get all sick notes for a certain period

request.description: Get all sick notes for a certain period. Information only reachable for users with role office or for users with the 'SICK_NOTE_VIEW' role.

item.name: Get all public holidays for a certain period

request.description: Get all public holidays for a certain period. Information only reachable for users with role office.

item.name: Get all departments of the application

request.description: Get all departments of the application
